import React from 'react' import { Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' export default class AddToCartComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { open: false, setOpen: false, itemType: '', processor: '', ramSize: '', hddSize: '', quantity: 0, acquiredPrice: 0, generation: '' } } handleChange(evt) { const value = evt.target.value; setState({ ...state, [evt.target.name]: value }); console.log(this.state) } render() { return

Add to cart component worksS
